title: Calculating Function
description:
For a positive integer n let's define a function f:

f(n) = - 1 + 2 - 3 + .. + (-1)^n*n

Your task is to calculate f(n) for a given integer n.

Input
The single line contains the positive integer n (1 <= n <= 10^15).

Output
Print f(n) in a single line.
hints: Tips:This question needs to use the geometric sequence summation formula to calculate in O(1), otherwise it will time out.
